def complex_play():
  RES = ('res', 5 +3j) + (7 - 9j)
  PROMPT(RES)  # should be 12-i6 or in Python 12-6j
  assert isCPX(RES)
  RES2 = SQRT(-25)  # should be 0+i4.898979
  PROMPT('sqrt res', RES2)
  A, B = toPOL(1, RES2)
  C, D = toREC(1, RES2)
  PROMPT(a,b,'and',c,d)
title: Complex test
